section.p: This template represents the status of the allergy indicating whether it is active, no longer active, or is an historic allergy. There can be only one allergy status observation per alert observation.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7318)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="33999-4" Status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7320)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7321)
